title: Please Read Before Using
description: DM on linkedin for feedback: https://www.linkedin.com/in/vlad-centea/
highlights: Linkedin calls via backend work just for private servers
For public servers, only proxy mode (browser extension) is supported for linkedin calls
If you use the public main server keep the browser extension active
If you get errors Linkedin cookies might be expired so make sure you have a linkedin tab in the browser and the extenssion shows linkedin connected with green. You will be good for a while again.

title: LinkedIn API Enhancements
description: Improved LinkedIn API integration and performance
highlights: Better error handling for rate limits
